alert.note: Alert for Orange County Inland (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued September 09 at 3:04AM PDT until September 10 at 12:00AM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TODAY TO MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...For the Excessive Heat Warning, dangerously hot conditions with temperatures up to 97. For the Wind Advisory, east winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Orange County Inland Areas. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors.
